chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
orig_base_params: BaseParams
one_node_params: OneNodeParams orig_base_params
raft_params: RaftParams orig_base_params

Goal:
forall A : Type, (forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) -> forall (f g : A -> nat) (l : list A) (a : A), (forall x : A, In x l -> a <> x -> f x = g x) -> (forall x : A, In x l -> f x <= g x) -> argmax g l = argmax f l \/ argmax g l = Some a

Premises:
In : forall A : Type, A -> list A -> Prop
Record OneNodeParams (P : BaseParams) : Type := Build_OneNodeParams { init : data; handler : input -> data -> output * data } Arguments Build_OneNodeParams _ _ _%function_scope
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
Inductive option (A : Type) : Type := Some : A -> option A | None : option A Arguments option _%type_scope Arguments Some {A}%type_scope a : rename Arguments None {A}%type_scope
Inductive GFormula (TA TX AA AF : Type) : Type := TT : Tauto.GFormula | FF : Tauto.GFormula | X : TX -> Tauto.GFormula | A : TA -> AA -> Tauto.GFormula | Cj : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | D : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | N : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | I : Tauto.GFormula -> option AF -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula Arguments Tauto.GFormula {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.TT {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.FF {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.X {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.A {TA TX AA AF}%type
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
argmax = fix argmax (A : Type) (f : A -> nat) (l : list A) {struct l} : option A := match l with | [] => None | a :: l' => match argmax A f l' with | Some a' => if f a' <=? f a then Some a else Some a' | None => Some a end end : forall A : Type, (A -> nat) -> list A -> option A Arguments argmax {A}%type_scope _%function_scope _%list_scope
Record RaftParams (orig_base_params : BaseParams) : Type := Build_RaftParams { N : nat; input_eq_dec : forall x y : input, {x = y} + {x <> y}; output_eq_dec : forall x y : output, {x = y} + {x <> y}; clientId : Type; clientId_eq_dec : forall x y : clientId, {x = y} + {x <> y} } Arguments Build_RaftParams _ _%nat_scope (_ _)%function_scope [clientId]%type_scope _%function_scope
argmax_fun_ext : forall (A : Type) (f g : A -> nat) (l : list A), (forall a : A, f a = g a) -> argmax f l = argmax g l
argmax_elim : forall (A : Type) (f : A -> nat) (l : list A) (a : A), argmax f l = Some a -> In a l /\ (forall x : A, In x l -> f a >= f x)
collate_head_head : forall (A B : Type) (A_eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (l : list (A * B)) (h n n' : A) (f : A -> A -> list B) (a : B), hd_error (f n' n) = Some a -> hd_error (collate A_eq_dec h f l n' n) = Some a
argmax_in : forall (A : Type) (f : A -> nat) (l : list A) (a : A), argmax f l = Some a -> In a l
remove : forall A : Type, (forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) -> A -> list A -> list A
remove_all : forall A : Type, (forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) -> list A -> list A -> list A
argmax_None : forall (A : Type) (f : A -> nat) (l : list A), argmax f l = None -> l = []
in_map_iff : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (l : list A) (y : B), In y (map f l) < -> (exists x : A, f x = y /\ In x l)
refl_trans_n1_trace_ind : forall (A trace : Type) (step : step_relation A trace) (P : A -> A -> list trace -> Prop), (forall x : A, P x x []) -> (forall (x x' x'' : A) (cs cs' : list trace), refl_trans_n1_trace step x x' cs -> P x x' cs -> step x' x'' cs' -> P x x'' (cs ++ cs')) -> forall (a a0 : A) (l : list trace), refl_trans_n1_trace step a a0 l -> P a a0 l
SetoidList.findA_NoDupA : forall (A B : Type) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop), RelationClasses.Equivalence eqA -> forall (eqA_dec : forall x y : A, {eqA x y} + {~ eqA x y}) (l : list (A * B)) (a : A) (b : B), SetoidList.NoDupA (fun p p' : A * B => eqA (fst p) (fst p')) l -> SetoidList.InA (fun p p' : A * B => eqA (fst p) (fst p') /\ snd p = snd p') (a, b) l < -> SetoidList.findA (fun a' : A => if eqA_dec a a' then true else false) l = Some b
refl_trans_1n_trace_n1_ind : forall (A trace : Type) (step : step_relation A trace) (P : A -> A -> list trace -> Prop), (forall x : A, P x x []) -> (forall (x x' x'' : A) (tr1 tr2 : list trace), refl_trans_1n_trace step x x' tr1 -> step x' x'' tr2 -> P x x' tr1 -> refl_trans_1n_trace step x x'' (tr1 ++ tr2) -> P x x'' (tr1 ++ tr2)) -> forall (x y : A) (l : list trace), refl_trans_1n_trace step x y l -> P x y l
filterMap = fix filterMap (A B : Type) (f : A -> option B) (l : list A) {struct l} : list B := match l with | [] => [] | x :: xs => match f x with | Some y => y :: filterMap A B f xs | None => filterMap A B f xs end end : forall A B : Type, (A -> option B) -> list A -> list B Arguments filterMap {A B}%type_scope _%function_scope _%list_scope
Build_MultiParams : forall (P : BaseParams) (name msg : Type), (forall x y : msg, {x = y} + {x <> y}) -> (forall x y : name, {x = y} + {x <> y}) -> forall nodes : list name, (forall n : name, In n nodes) -> NoDup nodes -> (name -> data) -> (name -> name -> msg -> data -> list output * data * list (name * msg)) -> (name -> input -> data -> list output * data * list (name * msg)) -> MultiParams P
In_nth_error : forall (A : Type) (l : list A) (x : A), In x l -> exists n : nat, nth_error l n = Some x
list_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : list A -> Prop), P [] -> (forall (a : A) (l : list A), P l -> P (a :: l)) -> forall l : list A, P l
In_filterMap : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> option B) (b : B) (xs : list A), In b (filterMap f xs) -> exists a : A, In a xs /\ f a = Some b
update : (forall x y : ?A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) -> (?A -> ?B) -> ?A -> ?B -> ?A -> ?B where ?A : [orig_base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params |- Type] ?B : [orig_base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params |- Type]
update2 : (forall x y : ?A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) -> (?A -> ?A -> ?B) -> ?A -> ?A -> ?B -> ?A -> ?A -> ?B where ?A : [orig_base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params |- Type] ?B : [orig_base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params |- Type]
collate_ls : (forall x y : ?A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) -> list ?A -> (?A -> ?A -> list ?B) -> ?A -> ?B -> ?A -> ?A -> list ?B where ?A : [orig_base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params |- Type] ?B : [orig_base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params |- Type]
collate : (forall x y : ?A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) -> ?A -> (?A -> ?A -> list ?B) -> list (?A * ?B) -> ?A -> ?A -> list ?B where ?A : [orig_base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params |- Type] ?B : [orig_base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params |- Type]
SetoidList.InA_cons_tl : forall (A : Type) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (x y : A) (l : list A), SetoidList.InA eqA x l -> SetoidList.InA eqA x (y :: l)
hd_error_some_nil : forall (A : Type) (l : list A) (a : A), hd_error l = Some a -> l <> []
Inductive InA (A : Type) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (x : A) : list A -> Prop := InA_cons_hd : forall (y : A) (l : list A), eqA x y -> SetoidList.InA eqA x (y :: l) | InA_cons_tl : forall (y : A) (l : list A), SetoidList.InA eqA x l -> SetoidList.InA eqA x (y :: l) Arguments SetoidList.InA [A]%type_scope _%function_scope _ _%list_scope Arguments SetoidList.InA_cons_hd [A]%type_scope [eqA]%function_scope [x y] _%list_scope Arguments SetoidList.InA_cons_tl [A]%type_scope [eqA]%function_scope [x] _ [l]%list_scope
refl_trans_1n_n1_trace : forall (A trace : Type) (step : step_relation A trace) (x y : A) (l : list trace), refl_trans_1n_trace step x y l -> refl_trans_n1_trace step x y l
Record MultiParams (P : BaseParams) : Type := Build_MultiParams { name : Type; msg : Type; msg_eq_dec : forall x y : msg, {x = y} + {x <> y}; name_eq_dec : forall x y : name, {x = y} + {x <> y}; nodes : list name; all_names_nodes : forall n : name, In n nodes; no_dup_nodes : NoDup nodes; init_handlers : name -> data; net_handlers : name -> name -> msg -> data -> list output * data * list (name * msg); input_handlers : name -> input -> data -> list output * data * list (name * msg) } Arguments Build_MultiParams _ [name msg]%type_scope (_ _)%function_scope [nodes]%list_scope _%function_scope _ (_ _ _)%function_scope
filter_rel : (forall x y : ?A, {?rel x y} + {~ ?rel x y}) -> ?A -> list ?A -> list ?A where ?A : [orig_base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params |- Type] ?rel : [orig_base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params |- Relation_Definitions.relation ?A]
Inductive NoDupA (A : Type) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) : list A -> Prop := NoDupA_nil : SetoidList.NoDupA eqA [] | NoDupA_cons : forall (x : A) (l : list A), ~ SetoidList.InA eqA x l -> SetoidList.NoDupA eqA l -> SetoidList.NoDupA eqA (x :: l) Arguments SetoidList.NoDupA [A]%type_scope _%function_scope _%list_scope Arguments SetoidList.NoDupA_nil [A]%type_scope _%function_scope Arguments SetoidList.NoDupA_cons [A]%type_scope [eqA]%function_scope [x] [l]%list_scope
in_or_app : forall (A : Type) (l m : list A) (a : A), In a l \/ In a m -> In a (l ++ m)
in_app_or : forall (A : Type) (l m : list A) (a : A), In a (l ++ m) -> In a l \/ In a m
SetoidList.InA_cons_hd : forall (A : Type) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (x y : A) (l : list A), eqA x y -> SetoidList.InA eqA x (y :: l)
